summary: A suspense horror film set in a small coastal town where, after a series of gory murders commited by mobs of townspeople against visiting tourists, the corpses begin to come back to life.
cast: James Farentino|Melody Anderson|Jack Albertson|Dennis Redfield|Nancy Locke|Lisa Blount|Robert Englund|Bill Quinn|Michael Currie|Christopher Allport|Joseph G. Medalis|Macon McCalman|Lisa Marie|Estelle Omens|Barry Corbin|Linda Shusett|Ed Bakey|Glenn Morshower|Robert Boler|Michael Pataki|Jill Fosse|Mark Courtney|Michael Courtney|Renee McDonell|Dottie Catching|Colby Smith|Judy Ashton|Anthony Cecere|Bill Couch Jr.|Bill Couch|Angelo De Meo
director: Director: Gary Sherman (as Gary A. Sherman)
title: Muertos y enterrados
